title: Understanding Get & Transform
text: Get & Transform is a powerful tool in Excel that allows you to handle large datasets efficiently. It is particularly useful for data extraction, connection, refinement, and transformation.

title: Key Functions of Get & Transform
text: Consider what Get & Transform can do with data. It can extract data from various sources, connect to different datasets, refine the data by cleaning or filtering, and transform it into a usable format.

hintAnswer: extracts, connects, refines, and transforms large amounts of data into Excel files
title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Which of the following best describes the function of Get & Transform?
choices: extracts, connects, refines, and transforms large amounts of data into Excel files
enables you to import and compare large amounts of data from multiple sources to build analytical relationships
creates an interactive visualization tool used to provide a $$drag-and-drop$$ interface for rapid model building
combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
